short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send website's URL to dictar.app for further processing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your listening skills in your target language by listening to a dictation. Use this extension to send the current URL to the dictar.app website.
